ComicInfo.Title: Stranded
ComicInfo.Summary: Stranded: The giant Hrungnir, who was wounded in the battle between Tyr and Odin, was left behind on Earth. He travels to Chicago in hopes of asking Thor to return him to Asgard but his infection has made him forget his plan and he just attacks Thor instead.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:23:19. [Issue ID 37243]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Dr. Jerry Weinberg (introduction),Odin (cameo, flashback),Dr. Carlin (introduction),Sif,Shawna Lynde,Thor,Nurse Stevens,Hrungnir
